column2: A server that can be forced to crash may be vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
column4: The server of [["this route handler"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-730/examples/server-crash.BAD.js:11:25:25:1"]] will terminate when an uncaught exception from this location escapes an [["asynchronous callback"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-730/examples/server-crash.BAD.js:12:22:24:3"]].
